snippet: The Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art is planning a comprehensive survey of contemporary American art.
abstract: Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art is planning comprehensive survey of American art, formed by visits to hundreds of artists' studios across country; State of the Art show will bring together work of 100 artists.
lead_paragraph: The Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art is planning a comprehensive survey of contemporary American art.
